FuncDef: This command configure a proxy neighbor discovery policy for the interface.

ParaDef.Info: The neighbor discovery policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. A maximum of five policy names can be specified in a single statement. The specified policy names must already be defined.
